maqras.text: eta emru-llahi fela testa`ciluh. subhanehu vete`ala `amma yusrikun
yunezzilu-lmelaikete birruhi min emrihi `ala mey yesau min `ibadihi en enziru ennehu la ilahe illa ene fettekun
haleka-ssemavati vel'arda bilhakk. te`ala `amma yusrikun
haleka-l'insane min nutfetin feiza huve hasimum mubin
vel'en`ame halekaha. lekum fiha dif'uv vemenafi`u veminha te'kulun
velekum fiha cemalun hine turihune vehine tesrahun
vetahmilu eskalekum ila beledil lem tekunu baligihi illa bisikki-l'enfus. inne rabbekum leraufur rahim
velhayle velbigale velhamira literkebuha vezineh. veyahluku ma la ta`lemun
ve`ale-llahi kasdu-ssebili veminha cair. velev sae lehedakum ecme`in
huve-llezi enzele mine-ssemai mael lekum minhu serabuv veminhu secerun fihi tusimun
yumbitu lekum bihi-zzer`a vezzeytune vennehile vel'a`nabe vemin kulli-ssemerat. inne fi zalike leayetel likavmiy yetefekkerun
vesehhara lekumu-lleyle vennehara vessemse velkamer. vennucumu musehharatum biemrih. inne fi zalike leayatil likavmiy ya`kilun
vema zerae lekum fi-l'ardi muhtelifen elvanuh. inne fi zalike leayetel likavmiy yezzekkerun
vehuve-llezi sehhara-lbahra lite'kulu minhu lahmen tariyyev vetestahricu minhu hilyeten telbesuneha. vetera-lfulke mevahira fihi velitebtegu min fadlihi vele`allekum teskurun
veelka fi-l'ardi ravasiye en temide bikum veenharav vesubulel le`allekum tehtedun
ve`alamat. vebinnecmi hum yehtedun
efemey yahluku kemel la yahluk. efela tezekkerun
vein te`uddu ni`mete-llahi la tuhsuha. inne-llahe legafurur rahim
vellahu ya`lemu ma tusirrune vema tu`linun
vellezine yed`une min duni-llahi la yahlukune sey'ev vehum yuhlekun
emvatun gayru ahya'. vema yes`urune eyyane yub`asun
ilahukum ilahuv vahid. fellezine la yu'minune bil'ahirati kulubuhum munkiratuv vehum mustekbirun
la cerame enne-llahe ya`lemu ma yusirrune vema yu`linun. innehu la yuhibbu-lmustekbirin
veiza kile lehum maza enzele rabbukum kalu esatiru-l'evvelin
liyahmilu evzarahum kamiletey yevme-lkiyameti vemin evzari-llezine yudillunehum bigayri `ilm. ela sae ma yezirun
kad mekera-llezine min kablihim feete-llahu bunyanehum mine-lkava`idi feharra `aleyhimu-ssakfu min fevkihim veetahumu-l`azabu min haysu la yes`urun
summe yevme-lkiyameti yuhzihim veyekulu eyne surakaiye-llezine kuntum tusakkune fihim. kale-llezine utu-l`ilme inne-lhizye-lyevme vessue `ale-lkafirin
ellezine teteveffahumu-lmelaiketu zalimi enfusihim. feelkavu-sseleme ma kunna na`melu min su'. bela inne-llahe `alimum bima kuntum ta`melun
fedhulu ebvabe cehenneme halidine fiha. felebi'se mesve-lmutekebbirin
